Package nl.tudelft.jpacman.strategy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIStrategy
    Abstract class for each Artificial Intelligence strategy.
    AStar<T>
    A* algorithm implementation using the method design pattern.
    AStarPath
    A* algorithm implementation to compute the shortest path.
    AStarPathTest
    Test for the astarPath class containing methods to calculate the best move to apply by the AI.
    ChosenStrategyTest
    Class to test the choice of the strategy for the game mode.
    ContinuousMovementTest
    Class to test the continuousMovement method for the continuous movement of the player.
    HumanControllerStrategy
    Class that represents the strategy where a player controls the pacman.
    HumanControllerStrategyTest
    Human strategy test in the game.
    MyJDialogStrategyTest
    Class to test the creation of window to chose strategy in the game.
    PacManhattanAI
    This class implements a strategy to clean the board and avoid the ghosts with AI.
    PacManhattanAITest
    AI test in the game.
    PacmanStrategy
    Abstract class for pacman strategy.
    SquareCoordinateTest
    Class to test coordinates of a square in the board.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PacmanStrategy.Type
    Different type of the strategy.
